mapper.select: select city.* from (select city_no from (select count(city_no) total, city_no from (select spot.city_no from jim join spot on jim.spot_name = spot.spot_name) group by city_no order by total desc) where rownum<7) B join city on city.no = B.city_no

select B.*, spot.spot_img from (select count(spot_name) total,A.spot_name from (select spot.city_no, spot.spot_name from spot join jim on jim.spot_name = spot.spot_name where city_no=#{city_no}) A group by spot_name order by total desc) B join spot on spot.spot_name = B.spot_name where rownum<9

select plan.* from (select * from (select count(B.plan_no) total, B.plan_no from (select A.* from (select dailyplan.plan_no, dailyplan.city_no from jim join dailyplan on jim.plan_no = dailyplan.plan_no) A where A.city_no=#{city_no})B group by B.plan_no order by total desc)where rownum<4) C join plan on c.plan_no = plan.plan_no
select A.*,member.m_img from (select B.*,spot.spot_name from (select * from SPOT_REPLY where city_no=#{city_no})B join spot on B.ref=spot.ref) A join MEMBER on A.id = member.id order by reg_date desc
select * from city where city_name like '%' || #{search} || '%'

select B.*, city.big_ename, city.no from (select count(city_name) jim, city_name from (select * from (select * from city where city_name like '%' || #{search} || '%') A join spot on spot.city_no = A.no) group by city_name) B join city on city.city_name=B.city_name
select count(city_name)jim, city_name from (select A.* from (select * from city where city_name like '%' || #{search} || '%') A join spot_reply on A.no = spot_reply.city_no) group by city_name
